name: TRAYveler (Godot wild jam #29)
description:
you play as Tray, a man who loves camping so much he’s decided that rather than buying a house and living there he is a nomad who likes camping. Every level you gain an ability that you use in the next one until the 6th level which uses all of them. Made for the godot wild jam #29

all background noise from https://freesound.org/

sound effects made in http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html

pixel art made in https://libresprite.github.io/

Please keep in mind this is my first game made in Godot 2d and is not very good

wanna chat? https://www.discord.gg/zK4J8p4
